name: In Your Paddle
description:
In this game you must cooperative with other players. You must push every buttons, then you unlock exit. At start only one player is free. Only after you have collected the whole team can you move on. If you fail you will have an explosive end. Play on 1360x768 resolution or higher.

SPACE - Start game

Backspace - Restart game

Esc - Back to menu

Blue Player: X axis on Pad1

Green Player: X axis on Pad2

White Player: Left and Right Arrows

Red Player: A and D buttons

Made by: Damian Barczyński, Karol Karczewski and Jakub Żak
